results.title: Configure AWS IAM Identity Center (successor to AWS Single Sign-On) for Single sign-on with Microsoft Entra ID - Microsoft Entra ID
results.description: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Microsoft Entra ID and AWS IAM Identity Center (successor to AWS Single Sign-On).

descriptions.content: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Microsoft Entra ID and AWS IAM Identity Center (successor to AWS Single Sign-On).

results.title: Connect Microsoft Sentinel to Amazon Web Services to ingest AWS service log data
results.description: Use the AWS connector to delegate Microsoft Sentinel access to AWS resource logs, creating a trust relationship between Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Sentinel.

descriptions.content: Use the AWS connector to delegate Microsoft Sentinel access to AWS resource logs, creating a trust relationship between Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Sentinel.
